# Anatomy Resources

Welcome to the Anatomy section of my resource page!  
Here you'll find helpful Quizlet flashcard folders to support your learning on various body systems.  
Feel free to explore these flashcard sets to review key concepts and prepare for your exams.

## Interactive 3D Anatomy

For a detailed and interactive 3D exploration of the human body, check out **Zygote Body**. This website allows you to zoom, rotate, and isolate specific parts of the body, making it an excellent tool for visual learning.

[Explore Zygote Body](https://www.zygotebody.com/)
